bibl.title: Economic Rationalism and Rural Society in Third-Century A.D. Egypt. The Heroninos Archive and the Appianus Estate. (Cambridge Classical Studies.)
bibl.note: Reconstructs the life and workings of the Appianus estate in the Fayum (IIIrd c. A.D.). - Pp. 410-420: Index of all the published texts of the Heroninos archive. - Pp. 456-462: réédition de P. Wessely Pragenses sans No. d'Inv. + P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 32010 (= S.B. VI, 9409, 2; XIV, 12382 recto).
RATHBONE Dominic, Economic Rationalism and Rural Society in Third-Century A.D. Egypt. The Heroninos Archive and the Appianus Estate. (Cambridge Classical Studies.)
Cambridge, University Press, 1991, 8°, xix-489 pp., 1 carte, tabl. £45/$84.50.
145.4 P. Wessely Pragenses sans No. d'Inv. + P. Vindob. Graec. Inv. 32010
